sn29.21-50:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn29.21-50:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana jalabujanam naganam …pe…
sn29.21-50:2.1: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kayena dvayakari hoti, vacaya dvayakari, manasa dvayakari.
sn29.21-50:2.5: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn29.21-50:2.9: So kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati.
sn29.21-50:2.10: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana opapatikanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
sn29.21-50:3.2: Evam catusu yonisu cattalisam veyyakarana honti.
sn29.21-50:3.3: Purimehi pana dasahi suttantehi saha honti pannasasuttantati.)
